channel.title: Build from source
channel.description: Hello. Which images of Debian buster should I use? debian-live-10.0.0-amd64-xfce.iso ? I didn't find it at Build Documentation. I should install Debian first?

item.title: Build from source
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Welcome to Whonix and thank you for your question.

Any Debian buster.

However, live (meaning non-persistent) is probably not what you want. Might work but might also fail due to RAM requirements during building.

Better to go with non-live for building.

Read full topic
